abstract: City investigators say Denzel Thompson, worker at Boys Town group home in Brooklyn, has been arrested after three boys he claimed he was monitoring slipped out of home and allegedly committed rape and robbery in Chinatown; contend he falsified logbooks and ceased monitoring residents.
lead_paragraph: City investigators said that Denzel Thompson, 24, had falsified logbooks and stopped monitoring the home’s residents, three of whom are accused of raping and robbing a woman in Manhattan.

headline.main: Former Worker Arrested in Brooklyn Group Home Investigation
headline.print_headline: Arrest in Inquiry of Group Home
